text: Another #FordFail from blatant @fordnation cronyism. @GeneralHillier takes $20K / month to learn on the job (VERY slowly), pad his @OntarioPCParty resumé, & bungle the #Covid19 #vaccine roll-out in Ontario, when @PublicHealthON could've done the job from the start, without him. https://t.co/Zy1qenAByt
